name: Heroic duel
description:
Game video Overview:

A simple multiplayer test project without any audio.

Controls:

Move:  "A"and"D"

Attack: "J"

Block: "K"

Roll: "L"

Details:

Derivation

Long press the attack button while tumbling.

Guard point

Split-second defensive action.

Fatigue

Block stun when skill point is 0.

How to play:

Before opening the game, make sure that the steam platform is already running, otherwise the game will not start.

Open MultiplayerDemo.exe directly or add non-STEAM games in STEAM.

Host: Click HOST to start the game

Client: Press shift+tab or open the friend window in STEAM, right click to join.

Make sure the game window is selected when the client connects, otherwise the connection will not succeed.

Special Thanks:

Thanks to Sven for player assets.

Thanks to Cainos for map assets.

Thanks to DreamMix for the icons assets.
